statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Kenya coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${8.00} per pound with some Arabian Mocha coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${9.70} per pound to create \displaystyle{60} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${8.31} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
